TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewGroupCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListViewGroupCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 控件内的组的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of groups within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取与关联控件。Use the property to get the associated with a control. 此集合包含对象表示在控件中显示的组时属性设置为值。This collection contains the objects that represent the groups shown in the control when the property is set to a value other than . 未分配给组的任何项目将出现在默认组，它具有标题标签"DefaultGroup{0}"。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 中不包含默认组集合，并且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它是主要适用于调试以确保所有项已正确都添加到组。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 如果不没有在任何组禁用收集，分组功能。If there are no groups in the collection, the grouping feature is disabled. 使用方法将单个组添加到集合。Use the method to add a single group to the collection. 使用方法在集合中特定索引处添加一个组。Use the method to add a group at a particular index within the collection. 若要删除某个组，请使用方法。To remove a group, use the method. 使用方法中删除特定索引处的组。Use the method to remove the group at a particular index. 不能添加到多次集合。You cannot add a to the collection more than once. 若要重新定位在集合中的组，必须首先将其从集合中删除，然后在所需位置插入。To reposition a group within the collection, it must first be removed from the collection, and then inserted at the desired location. 使用方法来确定特定组是否已在集合中。Use the method to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection. 若要检索集合中的组的索引，请使用方法。To retrieve the index of a group within the collection, use the method. 可以获取或设置与特定索引处的组索引器。You can get or set the group at a particular index with the indexer. 使用方法将多个组添加到集合。Use the method to add multiple groups to the collection. 可以将多个组添加作为数组的组或作为，通过检索他人财产的控件。You can add multiple groups either as an array of groups or as a that you retrieve through the property of another control. 使用方法从集合中移除所有组。Use the method to remove all the groups from the collection. > [!NOTE] > ， ，并方法从集合中删除组，但不是删除任何项控件。The , , and methods remove groups from the collection, but do not remove any items from the control. 如果不没有在任何组收集，禁用的分组功能和正常显示在控件中的所有项。If there are no groups in the collection, the grouping feature is disabled and all items in the control are displayed normally. 并方法都很有用，当你想要提供了多个方法中的项进行分组时控件。The and methods are useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items in a control. 若要执行此操作，创建多个组数组。To do this, create multiple group arrays. 若要更改分组，请先使用方法从集合中移除所有组，然后使用方法以添加要显示的组的下一步数组。To change the grouping, first use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add the next array of groups to display. 使用方法将组复制到兼容的数组指定索引处开始的集合中。Use the method to copy the groups in a collection to a compatible array starting at a specified index. 这很有用，例如，当你想在集合中使用组进行排序时方法。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort the groups in the collection using the method. 若要执行此操作，将组复制到兼容的数组，然后对数组进行排序。To do this, copy the groups into a compatible array, then sort the array. 接下来，使用方法从集合中移除所有组，然后使用方法排序的数组将重新添加到集合。Next, use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add the sorted array back to the collection. 使用属性来确定集合中有多少个组。Use the property to determine how many groups are in the collection. 若要循环访问集合，使用从返回方法。To iterate through the collection, use the returned from the method. > [!NOTE] > 当应用程序调用的分组功能是仅适用于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列方法。The grouping feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. 在早期操作系统，将忽略任何与组相关的代码和组将不会出现。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups will be ignored and the groups will not appear. 因此，任何代码都依赖于分组功能可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly. 可能想要将包含测试确定的分组功能是否可用，并且不可用时提供备用的功能。You might want to include a test that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，你可能想要提供备用排序时不支持按组排序的操作系统上运行。For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group. > > 插入标记功能提供的同一个库提供操作系统主题功能。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载，并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用分组功能，以将项目组织的详细信息视图中的子项值。The following example demonstrates how to use the grouping feature to organize items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，组是动态创建的。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的首字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 单击列标题对项排序成为该列创建的组。Clicking the header of a column sorts the items into the groups created for that column. 再次单击同一个列标题的组的顺序反转。Clicking the same column header again reverses the order of the groups. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将添加一个现有到集合。Use this method to add an existing to the collection. 不能添加到多次集合。You cannot add a to the collection more than once. 当您调用方法使用已在集合中，添加将失败，则返回-1。When you call the method using a that is already in the collection, the addition fails and -1 is returned. 若要向集合添加多个组，请使用方法。To add multiple groups to the collection, use the method.

summary.span: 向集合中添加组的数组。

span.span: Adds an array of groups to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此版本的方法将组的数组添加到组集合。Use this version of the method to add an array of groups to the group collection. 此方法时，可以创建多个对象，并希望将其添加到具有单个方法调用的集合。This method is useful when you create multiple objects and want to add them to the collection with a single method call. 若要将各个组添加到集合中，使用方法。To add individual groups to the collection, use the method. 当你想要提供多个组中的项的方法时，此方法也很有用控件。This method is also useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items in a control. 若要执行此操作，创建多个组数组。To do this, create multiple group arrays. 若要更改分组，请先使用方法从集合中移除所有组，然后使用方法来添加组的另一个数组。To change the grouping, first use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add a different array of groups. 与不同方法，方法不具有可用于确定要添加的组是否已在集合中的返回值。Unlike the method, the method does not have a return value that can be used to determine whether a group being added is already in the collection. 如果您需要此信息，请使用方法，然后再使用方法。If you need this information, use the method before using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何可以将组织的应用程序中使用方法子项中的值的详细信息视图的项。The following example demonstrates how the method can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，组是动态创建的。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的首字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 为每个列创建的组存储在子项文本或首字母以及一个哈希表中。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 单击列标题时，清除。When a column header is clicked, the is cleared. 然后检索对应于所单击的列的哈希表和每个项分配给相应的组。The hash table corresponding to the clicked column is then retrieved and each item is assigned to the appropriate group. 最后，哈希表中的组的已排序的数组添加到。Finally, a sorted array of the groups in the hash table is added to the . 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#2)]

summary.span: 从集合中移除所有组。

span.span: Removes all groups from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法从集合中移除所有组。Use this method to remove all the groups from the collection. 请注意，删除从分组集合不会删除项从控件。Note that removing groups from the collection does not remove items from the control. 此方法可用于禁用的分组功能。This method is useful to disable the grouping feature. 当没有任何组中的时控件，则这些项通常出现。When there are no groups in a control, the items appear normally. 若要从集合中删除单个组，请使用或方法。To remove individual groups from the collection, use the or method. 此方法时，还想要提供多种方式对项进行分组。This method is also useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items. 若要更改分组，请先使用方法从集合中移除所有组，然后使用方法来添加组的另一个数组。To change the grouping, first use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add a different array of groups. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何可以将组织的应用程序中使用方法子项中的值的详细信息视图的项。The following example demonstrates how the method can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，组是动态创建的。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的首字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 为每个列创建的组存储在子项文本或首字母以及一个哈希表中。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 单击列标题时，清除。When a column header is clicked, the is cleared. 然后检索对应于所单击的列的哈希表和每个项分配给相应的组。The hash table corresponding to the clicked column is then retrieved and each item is assigned to the appropriate group. 最后，哈希表中的组的已排序的数组添加到。Finally, a sorted array of the groups in the hash table is added to the . 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能添加到多次集合。You cannot add a to the collection more than once. 但是，尝试添加另一个副本将不引发异常。However, attempting to add another copy will not throw an exception. 相反，添加将失败。Instead, the addition will simply fail. 方法将在这种情况下返回值 – 1。The method will return a value of –1 in this case. 和方法，但是，不具有返回值。The and methods, however, do not have return values. 添加时使用下列方法之一的组，使用方法来确定某个特定已在集合中。When adding groups using one of these methods, use the method to determine whether a particular is already in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将集合 （包括它们所包含的项引用） 中的组复制到兼容的数组，指定索引处开始。Use the method to copy the groups in a collection (including the item references they contain) to a compatible array, starting at a specified index. 这很有用，例如，当你想在集合中使用组进行排序时方法。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort the groups in the collection using the method. 若要执行此操作，将组复制到兼容的数组，然后对数组进行排序。To do this, copy the groups into a compatible array, then sort the array. 接下来，使用方法从集合中移除所有组，然后使用方法排序的数组将重新添加到集合。Next, use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add the sorted array back to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将现有集合中特定索引处。Use this method to insert an existing at a particular index within the collection. 不能添加到多次集合。You cannot add a to the collection more than once. 当您调用方法使用了已在集合中，插入操作将失败的组。When you call the method using a group that is already in the collection, the insertion simply fails. 使用方法来确定特定组是否已在集合中的插入操作之前。Use the method before the insertion to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection. 若要重新定位在集合中的组，必须首先删除它，并再将其插入所需的索引处。To reposition a group within the collection, you must first remove it, and then insert it at the desired index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法从集合中删除组时必须在集合中的组的索引。Use this method to remove a group from the collection when you have the index of the group within the collection. 请注意，删除从分组集合不会删除项从控件。Note that removing groups from the collection does not remove items from the control. 若要删除某个组，使用该对象的引用，使用方法相反。To remove a group using a reference to the object, use the method instead. 若要从集合中移除所有组，请使用方法。To remove all the groups from the collection, use the method. 当从集合中移除项时，索引将更改集合中的后续项。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection. 删除有关已删除的项的所有信息。All information about the removed item is deleted.
